name: Sylvanus
description:
In the game Sylvanus you’ll play as Ohmec, a spirit summoned to the forest to cleanse it of an evil spirit named Raccner. In order to do this you'll have to make your way through the forest and into the lair where Raccner is hiding and defeat him.

Sylvanus offers multiple levels and three abilities to help you make your way through the level and fight off enemy's.

This is a game prototype I've been working on, its a platformer with minor combat elements would love to get some feed back.
